packages.title: Art and architecture in Ajanta alora

package_details.title: Village living in the Himalaya
package_details.sub_title: Soak in the Himalayan village lifestyle in Madmaheswar Valley, UK,India
package_details.description: We’ll stay in family homes in Madmaheswar Valley, a serene Himalayan valley full of exotic nature and wildlife. The people of the valley started this local community tourism project to offer us a look into their culture and traditions. We’ll hear from a village storyteller, take a guided tour of the village and its landmarks, witness traditional dance, trek to an ancient temple, and learn about the region’s farming techniques. A cook will teach us traditional Garhwali recipes and an artisan will show us how to make Himalayan bamboo handicrafts.

itinerary_details.title: Hiking (summer), Snowshoeing (winter)
itinerary_details.small_description: Join us on this all inclusive two nights package! It is special opportunity to connect accommodation in a traditional Norwegian cottage located in a birch forest,
itinerary_details.description: Join us on this all inclusive two nights package! It is special opportunity to connect accommodation in a traditional Norwegian cottage located in a birch forest, taste the local food, and snowshoeing/hiking experience. Polar Cabin is a perfect place for outdoor activities, observing Northern Lights in winter or just relaxing, reading books, listening to birds singing and enjoying nature. Suitable for couples, families, group of friends or small groups searching for something extraordinary. The place is very private, quiet and non-touristic. Breathe the nature of Northern Norway and just feel cosy and comfortable, romantic and excited.

itinerary_details.title: After breakfast arrival back
itinerary_details.small_description: After the breakfast we will drive you back to the city in front of hotel Clarion The Edge. Arrival back at approx 11am. It is also possible to drive you to the airport if needed.
itinerary_details.description: After the breakfast we will drive you back to the city in front of hotel Clarion The Edge. Arrival back at approx 11am. It is also possible to drive you to the airport if needed. It is also possible to have the breakfast sooner if you will have an early flight.
